name: DJ Filter
description: This algorithm is an implementation of the disting mk4 algorithm of the same name. It functions as a filter that sweeps from lowpass to highpass on a single control. The Sweep parameter sets the filter cutoff, with zero position applying no effect (indicated by '>DRY<'). Negative sweep values apply a lowpass filter with decreasing cutoff frequency, while positive sweep values apply a highpass filter with increasing cutoff frequency.
use_cases: Dynamic low/high-pass filtering in real-time audio processing
Creative sound design with sweepable cutoff frequencies
Automatable filter transitions for modular synthesis or live performance
gui_description: The interface features a central Sweep parameter controlling the filter transition from lowpass to highpass, with resonance adjustment and routing controls. A deadzone around zero is visually indicated by '>DRY<' next to the Sweep value.
